channel.title: A Taste Of Glory
channel.desc: It?s the Formula 1 of cooking. Team NZ battles the odds at Bocuse d?Or, bringing fierce passion and Kiwi ingenuity to the global stage in a bid to redefine New Zealand cuisine.

channel.title: Would I Lie To You?

channel.name: TVNZ 1 NZ

channel.desc: Join host Grant Denyer for a round of this high pressure and high stakes game show, where contestants face up to the Banker and must decide: is it deal or no deal.
